name: Ash Tales
description:
"Ash Tales" is a short text-based choose-your-own-adventure game that is currently in development.

The player will take the role of Baern, a non-binary scavenger who lives in an arid land populated by madness and atrocious creatures.

The story takes place in the scene of a zeppelin wreckage, where Baern will have to choose if to risk their life and search for valuable goodies, or keep on their journey. That decision is yours to make.
